sentences.en: Dingxi Prefecture is located in the foothill of the Loess Plateau climate is arid or semi - arid.
sentences.cn: 位于黄土高原丘陵沟壑干旱半干旱区的甘肃省定西地区,面临生态恶劣和经济贫困的双重危机.
喜马拉雅山脉的山麓丘陵

sentences.en: The scent of pine and the sound of crickets floated down from the foothill Appalachians.
sentences.cn: 松树的香味和蟋蟀的鸣叫声从阿巴拉契亚山麓飘送过来.

trans.tran_en: one of the smaller hills below a group of high mountains
